item.description:
All,

PLEASE NOTE WE'LL BE MEETING AT 1045AM THIS WEEK.

Or you could come around 11am.

All are welcome, it looks like snow is on the way, which makes the game a lot of fun! Come out and play football in the snow with us. All skill levels are welcome to join in. We are a friendly group that enjoy getting out to exercise and play some football. If you haven't come yet or haven't played football in the snow, come join us this weekend. It's going to be fun.

Hope to see you there,
-Frank
item.name: SAT - 1045AM - FLAG FOOTBALL - RUSSELL FIELD
